mapper.sql: SELECT GOODS_INFO_ID AS id, ORDER_COUNT AS orderCount, ORDER_MONEY AS orderAmt, ORDER_NUM AS orderNum, PAY_COUNT AS payCount, PAY_NUM AS payNum, PAY_MONEY AS payAmt, ORDER_CONVERSION AS orderConversion, PAY_CONVERSION AS payConversion, REFUND_COUNT AS returnOrderCount, REFUND_MONEY AS returnOrderAmt, REFUND_NUM AS returnOrderNum, UV AS totalUv , CUSTOMER_COUNT AS customerCount, SHOP_ID AS companyId FROM ${table}

select companyId, skuId, COALESCE(sum(orderCount),0) orderCount, COALESCE(sum(orderPrice),0) orderPrice, COALESCE(sum(orderNum),0) orderNum, COALESCE(sum(payCount),0) payCount, COALESCE(sum(payPrice),0) payPrice, COALESCE(sum(payNum),0) payNum, COALESCE(sum(totalUv),0) totalUv, COALESCE(sum(customerCount),0) customerCount, COALESCE(sum(returnCount),0) returnCount, COALESCE(sum(returnPrice),0) returnPrice, COALESCE(sum(returnNum),0) returnNum, now(), case when totalUv is null or totalUv=0 then LEAST(ROUND (customerCount/1,4) *100,100) else LEAST(ROUND (customerCount/totalUv,4) *100,100) end orderConversion from( select a.companyId, a.skuId, a.orderCount, a.orderPrice, a.orderNum, 0 payCount, 0 payPrice, 0 payNum, c.customerCount, d.totalUv, 0 returnCount, 0 returnPrice, 0 returnNum from ( select t.company_id companyId,i.sku_id skuId, count(1) orderCount,sum(level_price*num) orderPrice,sum(num) orderNum from replay_trade t left join replay_trade_item i on(t.tid=i.tid) where t.create_time >= #{beginTime} and t.create_time < #{endTime} group by t.company_id,i.sku_id ) a
left join ( select skuId,count(customerId) customerCount from ( select i.sku_id skuId,t.customer_id customerId from replay_trade t left join replay_trade_item i on(t.tid=i.tid) where t.create_time >= #{beginTime} and t.create_time < #{endTime} group by i.sku_id,t.customer_id ) tmp group by skuId )c on(a.skuId=c.skuId) left join ( select skuId,count(userId) totalUv from ( select distinct sku_id skuId, user_id userId from replay_sku_flow_user_info where sku_flow_date >= #{beginTime} and sku_flow_date < #{endTime} )tmp group by skuId ) d on(a.skuId=d.skuId)
union all
select t.company_id companyId, i.sku_id skuId, 0 orderCount, 0 orderPrice, 0 orderNum, count(i.id) payCount, sum(price*num) payPrice, sum(num) payNum, 0 customerCount, 0 totalUv, 0 returnCount, 0 returnPrice, 0 returnNum from replay_trade t left join replay_trade_item i on(t.tid=i.tid) where t.pay_time >= #{beginTime} and t.pay_time < #{endTime} and t.pay_state=2 group by t.company_id,i.sku_id
union all
select o.company_id companyId, i.sku_id skuId, 0 orderCount, 0 orderPrice, 0 orderNum, 0 payCount, 0 payPrice, 0 payNum, 0 customerCount, 0 totalUv, count(i.id) returnCount, sum(i.price*i.num) returnPrice, sum(i.num) returnNum from replay_return_order o left join replay_return_item i on(o.rid=i.rid) where finish_time >= #{beginTime} and finish_time < #{endTime} group by i.sku_id,o.company_id
) g where skuId is not null GROUP BY companyId,skuId
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM GOODS_DAY WHERE STAT_DATE = date_format(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.select:
select id, orderCount, orderAmt, orderNum, payCount, payNum, payAmt, returnOrderCount, returnOrderAmt, returnOrderNum, companyId, b.goods_info_name name, b.goods_info_no skuNo, b.erp_goods_info_no erpNo from ( SELECT GOODS_INFO_ID AS id, sum(ORDER_COUNT) AS orderCount, sum(ORDER_MONEY) AS orderAmt, sum(ORDER_NUM) AS orderNum, sum(PAY_COUNT) AS payCount, sum(PAY_NUM) AS payNum, sum(PAY_MONEY) AS payAmt, sum(REFUND_COUNT) AS returnOrderCount, sum(REFUND_MONEY) AS returnOrderAmt, sum(REFUND_NUM) AS returnOrderNum, max(SHOP_ID) AS companyId FROM GOODS_DAY where STAT_DATE >= date_format(#{begDate},'%Y-%m-%d') AND STAT_DATE <= date_format(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d') AND SHOP_ID = #{companyId}
GROUP BY GOODS_INFO_ID ORDER BY orderNum DESC , GOODS_INFO_ID ASC limit ${number}, ${size} ) a left join replay_goods_info b on (a.id = b.goods_info_id)

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT GOODS_INFO_ID) FROM GOODS_DAY where STAT_DATE >= date_format(#{begDate},'%Y-%m-%d') AND STAT_DATE <= date_format(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND SHOP_ID = #{companyId}
